stories.title: WebFeed: Turn Browser into Feed Reader
Show HN: I built a walkthrough of Redis's source code

stories.text: Hi, since conversation between human users at HN is what makes the platform attractive at it is, I am wondering what HN is doing, or is going to do, when more sophisticated bots could land to parrot certain narratives or influence the conversation on important topics. Is there any way to detect such behavior?
stories.title: Ask HN: Does HN do anything to prevent AI-grade bots?
The Return of the Bison: Europe’s Largest Wild Animal

stories.text: Since when does Facebook lie about notifications in order to encourage a behavior of downloading messenger, if people don't know about their mobile browser's "view as desktop", allegedly?  I mean, it is a NEW notification indicator after all, not about a message I got a week ago and read then (that wouldn't actually notify me of anything, so the lie would be about it being a notification at all).
stories.title: When I go to Facebook in a browser, it shows 4 messages, but “view as desktop”
Researchers show effectiveness of migraine drug in weight loss, frovatriptan
U.S. successfully tests pair of Lockheed hypersonic missiles
